tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It gives immense pleasure to share my joy of experiencing birth of my baby boy at  The birth place.Though skeptical of long distance from my home to birthplace...i took decision of delivering my baby at birth place and swiftly followed it in 8 th month of my pregnancy.Here comes my major decision of choosing my consultant obstetrician.After a lot of research..i have consulted Dr.Girija Lakshmi Ch.She has literally made me so comfortable in my very first visit which gave me confidence.She has guided me in a friendly manner, never impressed any unnecessary medication or tests.
On 22nd oct, my water broke and i contacted birthplace emergency and they have asked me to come hospital immediately. By the time i reached hospital..i was wondered by the reception i received right from the security, front desk people to duty doctors and nurses.This gesture of birthplace from all the staff is highly appreciable.Dr Girija has been continuously monitoring my status over the phone.Though i was confirmed with significantly low AFI...my Dr. has taken a call of continuing the ongoing natural delivery process unlike rushing for C section in any other hospitals.I am ever grateful for Dr Girija for taking this call and  for putting  confidence in me that i would deliver vaginally.Dr Girija has comforted me and made my dream of delivering naturally into reality at 9:59 pm.As soon as i delivered, Dr Madhavi has monitored my baby and told us my baby was doing good.We liked the way whole team of birthplace has customised the labor process.
I was worried as to how i would manage post delivery  as single attendee was allowed as part of covid protocol but all my apprehensions were put to bay after experiencing the continuous care from the sisters and ayammas.Literally me and my husband were impressed by the facility of providing two separate nurses for mother and child who have taken care us from time to time and were a call away.
We thank birthplace for providing beautiful experience in bringing our little bundle of joy to this world.

I had an excellent experience during my recent doctor consultation. The doctor was not only knowledgeable but also displayed genuine concern and empathy. They took the time to listen attentively to my concerns, explained the diagnosis and treatment plan thoroughly, and answered all my questions. The overall atmosphere was welcoming, and the staff was courteous. I highly recommend this doctor for their expertise and patient-centered approach.

I had an outstanding consultation with Dr. Girija Lakshmi. Her expertise, compassionate approach, and meticulous attention to detail were truly impressive. Dr. Lakshmi took the time to listen attentively to my concerns, explained medical information in a way that was easy to understand, and provided comprehensive guidance on my health issues. I feel fortunate to have found a doctor who combines medical expertise with genuine care. I highly recommend Dr. Girija Lakshmi for anyone in search of a dedicated and knowledgeable healthcare professional.

review: Dr Girja Lakshmi ******** ***** ** ******* ** **** ******* ******** *** don’t even care to give a prescription and asks them to follow it by call ***** ****** ******* ******** *** ** ** ** *** *** * ******* *** ********* ** ******* .I don’t recommend this Doctor ,had a really terrible bad experience at birth place  hospital with her .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I would highly recommend Dr. Girija as she’s very friendly and listens with patience.
She also explains every single detail clearly.
Most importantly, Dr. Girija focuses more on Normal Delivery.
The nursing staff at Birthplace was also very helpful.
Thank you Dr. Girija for being by my side throughout my pregnancy.

review: Likes the way ahe explains the problem and gives medication accordingly. Am happy with her treatment
